name: Spud!
description: Take on the role of Spud and prevent the evil Doctor Chillblane from enslaving the world with his cruel tyranny. Travel the world from pole to pole running a gauntlet of strange creatures.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 / 7 / Vista / XP Processor: Pentium 800 Mhz or higher Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: SVGA video card capable of 1024x768 and 24-bit color Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: 100% compatible WindowsÂ® 16-bit sound card and drivers

reviews.review_text: What a horrible game to share a nickname with. Even with a guide it took two hours, and it was all awful. Horrible animation, acting, jokes, references, gameplay, logic... Screw this game. I need therapy. I'm considering picking a different internet handle now.  Don't play this.
